fish-code-block.begin:
(?xi)               # Ignore whitespace. Case insensitive.
(?:^|\G)
(\s*)               # 1: Indentation.
((?:`|~){3,})       # 2: Delimiter
\s*
(fish)              # 3: Language.
(?:\s++([^`~]+?))?  # 4: Language attributes.
\s*$
fish-code-block.end:
(?x)                # Ignore whitespace.
(?:^|\G)
(?:\s{,3}|\1)       # Up to 3 optional spaces or match begin indentation.
(\2)                # 1: Match begin delimiter.
\s*$
fish-code-block.name: markup.fenced_code.block.markdown
